dmca.title: Notification of Copyright Breach
dmca.body:
Notification of Copyright BreachTo Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx
<http://www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx> 

 

Legal Response Team


________________________________

From: Neil Ferguson [mailto:nferguson@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 2:43 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Notification of Copyright Breach
Subject: Notification of Copyright Breach


FAO: Chris Newcomb, Abuse Team Leader, Everyones Internet Ltd.
 
It has come to my attention that you are hosting my copyrighted work
without authorization on the website:
http://www.globalbuzz-sa.com/book-swap/index.php?s=library. This work is
essentially identical to my work at: http://www.readitswapit.co.uk and
clearly used my work as a basis. 
 
Under the requirements of the Online Copyright Infringement Liability
Limitation Act (1998) you are obliged to block this content from access.
Please do this as soon as possible.
 
Regards.
 
Neil Ferguson.
www.readitswapit.co.uk
